sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
GPU | 8086:9a49 | Yes
Ethernet (via mHDMI adapter) | 8086:15fc | Yes
Wireless | 8086:a0f0 | Yes
Bluetooth | 8087:0026 | Yes
Touchpad | 04f3:3134 | Yes
Webcam HD/IR | 13d3:56eb | Yes
Speakers | 8086:a0c8 | Yes
Microphone | 8086:a0c8 | Yes
Keyboard backlight | - | Yes
TPM (2.0) | unknown | Untested
Fingerprint reader | unknown | Untested

This article applies to B9450CEA-XH75 (16G RAM/1TB SSD) and B9450CEA-XH77 (32G RAM/2TB SSD).

sections.title: Summary
sections.content:
The 2nd generation of ASUS ExpertBook B9450 with 11th Gen Intel CPU with Intel Xe graphics.

Models are B9450CEA-* compared to B9450FA-* of the 1st generation.

sections.title: BIOS
sections.content:
To boot from a USB stick, you may have to turn off Fast Boot and Secure Boot: How to boot the system from USB flash drive/CD-ROM.

dmidecode will also display Product Name as ASUS EXPERTBOOK B9400CEA_B9450CEA and BIOS Version as, e.g., B9400CEA.301.

sections.title: Audio
sections.content: This laptop requires Sound Open Firmware in order for the soundcard to work.

sections.title: Suspend mode
sections.content: See Power management/Suspend and hibernate#Changing suspend method.

sections.title: Function keys
sections.content:
Table content:
Key | Visible? | Marked? | Effect
Fn+Esc | No | Yes | Enables Fn lock
Fn+F1 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMute
Fn+F2 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioLowerVolume
Fn+F3 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioRaiseVolume
Fn+F4 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessDown
Fn+F5 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessUp
Fn+F6 | Yes | Yes | XF86TouchpadToggle
Fn+F7 | No | Yes | Switches keyboard backlight
Fn+F8 | Yes | Yes | p
Fn+F9 | Yes | Yes | l
Fn+F10 | No | Yes | N/A
Fn+F11 | Yes | Yes | S
Fn+F12 | No | Yes | N/A
